parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Environment

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the remaining time (in seconds) over which the current weather change will occur.
<br>
When a weather change finishes, the game engine will automatically generate a new random weather change over a realistic time period (minimum of 90 minutes).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Number]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''nextWeatherChange'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_seconds = [[nextWeatherChange]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Each client and the server can have differing weather.
</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[fog]], [[fogForecast]], [[setFog]], [[overcast]], [[setOvercast]], [[overcastForecast]], [[forceWeatherChange]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
